paragraph: Anthony Kilhoffer is an American hip hop record producer, songwriter and engineer, best known for his collaborations with Kanye West, Kid Cudi, Keyshia Cole and John Legend.
Passion, Pain & Demon Slayin' - Kid Cudi
The Life of Pablo - Kanye West
Watch the Throne - Jay-Z & Kanye West
My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy - Kanye West
Man on the Moon II - Kid Cudi
Man on the Moon - Kid Cudi
Como Ama una Mujer - Jennifer Lopez
I Changed My Mind - Keyshia Cole
Grammy Award for Best Rap Album
2011 - My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy - Kanye West
2005 - Late Registration - Kanye WestGrammy Award for Best R&B Album
